$description: Moody, sophisticated theme inspired by twilight. Deep purples meet warm earth tones for dramatic, creative interfaces.

sans.$description: Primary font family for body text and UI

sm.$description: Small shadow with slightly deeper intensity for drama

md.$value: 0 4px 8px -1px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-shadow) 12%, transparent), 0 2px 4px -2px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-shadow) 8%, transparent)

lg.$value: 0 12px 20px -4px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-shadow) 15%, transparent), 0 4px 8px -4px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-shadow) 10%, transparent)
lg.$description: Large shadow for modals, popovers - deeper for mystery

hover.$value: 0 6px 12px -2px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-shadow) 14%, transparent), 0 3px 6px -2px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-shadow) 10%, transparent)

DEFAULT.$value: 0 4px 8px -1px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-shadow) 12%, transparent), 0 2px 4px -2px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-shadow) 8%, transparent)
DEFAULT.$description: Prominent resting shadow for featured elements

hover.$value: 0 8px 16px -3px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-shadow) 16%, transparent), 0 4px 8px -3px color-mix(in srgb, var(--color-shadow) 12%, transparent)
hover.$description: Elevated shadow for highlighted hover state

pressed.$description: Compressed shadow for highlighted pressed state

sm.$description: Small inset shadow for subtle pressed states

md.$description: Medium inset shadow for standard pressed states

underline.$description: Bottom underline effect for active indicators

xl.$description: Extra large border radius - pill shapes, badges

xs.$description: Extra small element size (24px) - compact buttons, badges

sm.$description: Small element size (32px) - small buttons, inputs

md.$description: Medium element size (40px) - default buttons, inputs

lg.$description: Large element size (48px) - large buttons, inputs

xl.$description: Extra large element size (56px) - hero buttons, prominent elements

2xs.$description: Extra extra small spacing (2px) - very tight gaps, micro spacing

xs.$description: Extra small spacing (4px) - tight inline elements, icon gaps

sm.$description: Small spacing (8px) - form inputs, button padding

md.$description: Medium spacing (12px) - card padding, section gaps

base.$description: Base spacing (16px) - component padding, medium element gaps

lg.$description: Large spacing (32px) - section separation, major gaps

xl.$description: Extra large spacing (64px) - page sections, major separators

2xl.$description: Double extra large spacing (128px) - hero sections, major landmarks

line.$description: Standard border for cards, inputs, containers (default)

thick.$description: Heavier border for emphasis or structural separation

highlight.$description: Prominent dashed border for highlighting, selection, or CTAs
